Sentencas: Paper presents parametric evaluation of a modified design of a conceptual micro-combined heat and power unit (micro-CHP) with solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes

Sentencas: The system incorporates oxygen transport membranes to supply high purity oxygen for post-combustion of lean fuel leaving the SOFC stack.
Titulo: Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes

Sentencas: The concentrations of CO2 in the flue gases leaving the system, approaches 99% (on dry gas basis).
Titulo: Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes

Sentencas: High temperature oxygen transport membranes, made of perovskite materials, enable oxygen permeation rate exceeding 6 Nml/(cm(2) min).
Titulo: Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes

Sentencas: The oxygen permeation is strongly related to the ratio of oxygen partial pressures at the retentate and permeate sides.
Titulo: Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes

Sentencas: Results of a parametric evaluation of the system, including the analysis of effects of membrane characteristics on the electrical efficiency, are presented and discussed.
Titulo: Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes

Sentencas: Oxygen transport membranes require high pressure at the feed site, therefore an increase of auxiliary power consumption should be expected to achieve high oxygen flow through the membrane.
Titulo: Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes

Sentencas: Electrical penalty in range 6-12%-point was observed, in comparison with a conventional micro-CHP system without oxy-combustion.
Titulo: Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes

Sentencas: These numbers are often quoted for large power systems operating in a CCS-ready mode with state-of-the-art oxygen separation methods such as pressure swing adsorption (PSA).
Titulo: Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes

Sentencas: Electrical efficiency of the system discussed in this paper was evaluated and effects of oxygen permeation rate on the electrical efficiency were analyzed.
Titulo: Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes
Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes

Titulo: Parametric evaluation of a micro-CHP unit with solid oxide fuel cells integrated with oxygen transport membranes
